Another variation of the [[Sexy Technique]], the user and a staff are transformed into a woman with an especially attractive body (hence the "Nice Body" title) wearing a red bikini on a pole. The woman winks, blows kisses and speaks seductively to the victim to add to the effectiveness of this technique. [[Konohamaru]] showed this technique to [[Naruto]] in a failed attempt to impress him, only to find out that Naruto had already learned it while developing the [[New Sexy Technique]].
